short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you use left and right arrows for going back or forth on HBO Max. This extension has no connections any HBO products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I have for a long time been bothered by not being able to go back and forth in a video using the arrow keys. That's why I made this extension where you can use Alt+Left and Alt+Right to go back and forth.
